taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2023-25 is not valid. There is no minimum tax year.

submittedOn.description: The date the ITSA status was submitted, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

status.description: The ITSA Status for the Tax Year. Values are 00 = No Status; 01 = MTD Mandated; 02 = MTD Voluntary; 03 = Annual; 04 = Non Digital; 05 = Dormant; 99 = MTD Exempt.

statusReason.description: The reason for the ITSA Status. Values are 00 = Sign up - return available; 01 = Sign up - no return available; 02 = ITSA final declaration; 03 = ITSA Q4 declaration; 04 = CESA SA return; 05 = Complex; 06 = Ceased income source; 07 = Reinstated income source; 08 = Rollover; 09 = Income Source Latency Changes.

businessIncomePriorTo2Years.description: The business income prior to 2 years. For Q4 check, the business income prior to 1 year will be used.
